title: hexo搭建个人博客
text: 一直有个自己的站点，用来谢谢文章，把学习的一些东西记录下来，也能偶尔记录点个人想法。偶然的机会，见识到同事的博客，体验甚好，更加触动了搭建个人站点的想法。从同事了解了下是用hexo来搭建的，下来找资料，上hexo官网看，一步步来搭建自己的博客。

title: Markdown语法及编辑工具
text: 花了好几天搭建完博客是为了写东西记录学习和生活的点滴Hexo博客 用的是Markdown语法来书写博文的， 所以在正式写之前先 熟悉下markdown语法， 并对常用的一些 二级引用\’ ::: successWe provide email support to those who have purchased the apps: service@tylingsoft.com语法做作了下总结，基本可以满足平常的写作需求::: ::: warningAdding many flowcharts will slow down the editor.::: ::: infoYou have new mail.::: ::: dangerStaying up all night is bad for health.::: 百度联系： Bai Du 图像: 有序列表： Html标签兼容 特殊字符的自动转换,尤其是&和<,> 段落前后需有空行 strikethrough++insert++==mark==表格：First Header | Second Header———— | ————-Content from cell 1 | Content from cell 2Content in the first column | Content in the second column Left-Aligned Center Aligned Right Aligned col 3 is some wordy text $1600 col 2 is centered $12 Task list [ ] a bigger project [x] first subtask [x] follow up subtask [ ] final subtask [ ] a separate task AbbreviationMarkup is based on php markdown extra definition, but without multiline support: [HTML]: Hyper Text Markup Language [W3C]: World Wide Web ConsortiumThe HTML specificationis maintained by the W3C. print 'hello code'evens = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5].collect do |item| item * 2 end 12345$(document).ready(() => { $('pre code').each((i, block) => { hljs.highlightBlock(block); });});
